description: System-generated unique identifier for the asset group record, used as the primary key for joins and references.
Alternate or legacy identifier for the asset group (distinct from the primary key); likely sourced from an external system; confirm with SME.
Short human-readable label or description of the asset groupâ€™s purpose or category.
Free-text notes or additional details about the asset group.
Timestamp when the record was last updated in the database (system-level audit).
Timestamp of the last user-attributed update; naming implies user context rather than system process; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user who originally created the record.
Timestamp when the record was initially created.
Identifier of the user who last updated the record.
Timestamp when the record was most recently updated by a user.
